title: Royal Orchid aims for major expansion with 11,000 keys by 2026
description: Royal Orchid, a hospitality company based in Bangalore, plans to expand its portfolio to 11,000 keys over the next two years by entering new markets in Jammu & Kashmir, Uttar Pradesh, Andhra Pradesh, and Telangana, and by enhancing its presence in existing locations.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
